name: DK Finechemical Co., Ltd.
description: Manufacturer of eco-friendly functional additives made from natural wood and cotton-derived cellulose, serving industries including construction, food, animal feed, and medicine.
one_liner: Manufacturer of eco-friendly functional additives made from natural wood and cotton-derived cellulose, serving industries including construction, food, animal feed, and medicine.

name: Instanture Holdings Sdn Bhd
description: Our suite of AI SAAS help brand & distributor to manage their order & pay operation across multiple sales channels
one_liner: Our suite of AI SAAS help brand & distributor to manage their order & pay operation across multiple sales channels
industry: AI/Machine Learning, Supply Chain, Big Data

name: Nonnatech, Inc.
description: Developer of a device-agnostic platform designed for early detection of health conditions and pinpoints those who may be at risk of hospitalization. The company's platform aids in the early detection of physiological changes by utilizing data from FDA-approved devices, predictive analytics, and machine learning, enabling healthcare professionals to track and monitor the health conditions and physical changes of their patients.
one_liner: Developer of a device-agnostic platform designed for early detection of health conditions and pinpoints those who may be at risk of hospitalization. The company's platform aids in the early detection of physiological changes by utilizing data from FDA-approved devices, predictive analytics, and machine learning, enabling healthcare professionals to track and monitor the health conditions and physical changes of their patients.
industry: AI/Machine Learning, Health Tech, Big Data, Healthcare

name: The News Lens Co., Ltd.
description: Developer of digital advertising, data analytics, and media platforms intended to provide original and current media content to the Asian market. The company platform provides inclusive, in-depth, diverse, and highly influential content for digital readers, it grasps user information through zero-party, first-party, and third-party databases, AI analysis, Martech, and other cross-domain core products, enabling users to get suitable reading content and to easily share, discuss and participate in topics they are interested in.
